TestCase.name: testSimpleJoin
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[*(o_amount, rate) AS rate]) +- StreamExecTemporalTableFunctionJoin(where=[AND(__TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION(o_rowtime, rowtime, currency), =(currency, o_currency))], join=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime, currency, rate, rowtime], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[o_currency]]) : +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

TestCase.name: testComplexJoin
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecJoin(where=[=(t3_secondary_key, secondary_key)], join=[rate, secondary_key, t3_comment, t3_secondary_key], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[secondary_key]]) : +- StreamExecCalc(select=[*(o_amount, rate) AS rate, secondary_key]) : +- StreamExecTemporalTableFunctionJoin(where=[AND(__TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION(o_rowtime, rowtime, currency), OR(=(currency, o_currency), =(secondary_key, o_secondary_key)))], join=[o_rowtime, o_amount, o_currency, o_secondary_key, rowtime, currency, rate, secondary_key], joinType=[InnerJoin]) : :- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) : : +- StreamExecCalc(select=[o_rowtime, o_amount, o_currency, o_secondary_key]) : : +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]]) : +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) : +- StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime, currency, rate, secondary_key], where=[>(rate, 110)]) : +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_2]]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[t3_secondary_key]]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleProctimeJoin
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[*(o_amount, rate) AS rate]) +- StreamExecTemporalTableFunctionJoin(where=[AND(__TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION(o_proctime, currency), =(currency, o_currency))], join=[o_amount, o_currency, o_proctime, currency, rate], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[o_currency]]) : +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_2]]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[currency, rate]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_3]])
